job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: strongThe RolebrbrstrongCedar is a patient payment and engagement platform that elevates the total patient experience beyond clinical care The platform leverages data science and technology to deliver modern intelligence to health providers and payers and simplify the healthcare experience for patientsbrbrCedar is growing rapidly and data is at the core of everything we do We build analytics for our clients and our teams to inform the product development process We tell stories about all aspects of the patient journey and use quantitative analyses to explain patient behavior We run experiments to test our various hypotheses and iterate using our results We build models to drive better decisionmaking both within our organization and for our clients in the healthcare industrybrbrAs the scale of the data that we collect has grown we are looking for a strongData Scientist strongwith a passion for tool development to join our Data Science Team This role will be central in our efforts in scaling our data science tooling to support our organizations growth This is a great opportunity to work in a nonsiloed collaborative meritocracy on challenging problems with other scientists and engineersbrulli Cedar is committed to a flexible work environment so this as well as many of our roles are remote friendlybrliulstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliBuilding and optimizing the process of deploying scalable and reusable statistical data science libraries to support experiments machine learning models and product analysesliliCollaborate with data engineers in building tools to standardize and streamline analysis and designing and deploying new experimentation data science and machine learning pipelinesliliCollaborate with the platform team to deploy new tooling to support the ongoing data science effortsbrliulstronguSkills And Experiencebrustrongulli2 years experience as a data scientistlili2 years experience of software engineering best practicesliliExperience working with relational databases such as PostgreSQL or MySQLliliExperience with Python and ORM tools such as SQL AlchemyliliSound knowledge of statistical algorithm implementationsliliDemonstrates a passion for breaking down and understanding complex systemsliliA great teammate with excellent communication and listening skillsliliAbility to thrive in an entrepreneurial environment comfortable with ambiguityliliStrong computer science fundamentalsliliEncompass Cedars core values mission driven no mediocrity use good judgement and growth mindsetliliExcited about Cedars mission of improving the healthcare financial experienceliliEligible to work in the United StatesbrliulstronguPrefered Skills And ExperiencesbrustrongulliExperience with AWS data servicestools such as Sagemaker Redshift S3 Athena Glue is preferredbrliulstrongWhat do we offer to the ideal candidatebrstrongulliAn opportunity to work on a platform that is scaling very rapidly engaging with millions of patients per year and growing at a rate of 360 YoY as of January 2021liliA chance to join a highgrowth company at an early stageliliThe ability to impact the growth of our company we value all comments and suggestionsliliTransparency across teams and interaction with multiple departmentsliliCompetitive pay employerpaid
